title: Pretty good
review: For a reboot it is very good, altough the old one is better. In the movie it doesn't feel like the 80's. The jumpscares were really good but this could have been better if they added some more jumpscares to it.

title: Scary
review: This movir from Ari Aster is a different kind of horror movie. It is more about the grieving process the family is dealing with. And i have to say that Toni Collette slayed her role. She really deserved a oscar for her role.

movie_title: Star Wars: Episode IX - The Rise of Skywalker
title: Good
review: I enjoyed it very much. I only wish Leia had a bigger part in the movie.

movie_title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
title: Classic
review: This movie is already a classic. Quentin Tarantino really shows how it is behind the scenes in hollywood. Leo and Brad performed good.

title: Great
review: This movie is a masterpiece. Jordan Peele really made it to the top with this movie. Also the concept was really great. For 2017 you don't get many movies that have an original script. Most of them are reboot, prequel or sequel. The acting of daniel kaluuya was outstanding. Really great.

title: Masterpiece
review: The performance of Brie Larson was great. And it is a shame that Jacob Tremblay didn't get an oscar for his performance. He really deserved more credits. If his acting wasn't so good, the acting of brie larson wouldn't have such an impact.

title: Boring
review: The CGI in the movie was really outstunning, but the movie didn't offer more than the original. The old one is much better.

title: True Horror
review: This is the best horror movie i have ever seen. The jumpscares were really good. The acting performance is great. A really must see if you like horror.

title: PHENOMENAL
review: The performance of joaquin phoenix is a masterpiece. If he doesn't get an oscar for this than I don't know wat is oscar worthy. You would't expect this from Todd Phillips, but he made a masterpiece.

title: LAME
review: You can't compare this to the 1st installment. It (2017) had much potential. It is a waste to see so much potential fade away in the 2nd installment. It was boring. Some of the flashback scenes weren't even necessary. There should have been more jumpscares in it and i wish i could have seen more of bill skarsgard's performance as pennywise. The ending didn't make sense. And the comedy shouldn't be in the movie. Sometimes a clown can be scarier than CGI monsters.

title: The only true king
review: For me the original is always better than the reboot. But this has such an emotional impact. Great.
